channel.title: Model Meters - AI-generated Monthly Summaries
channel.description: AI-generated monthly summaries of Azure AI Foundry pricing changes and updates

item.title: 1 November 2025
item.description:
Speech


- Voice Live API and BYO meters for LLM text, LLM audio, and standard/custom speech audio (input, output, cached) across Lite/Std/Pro tiers and voice conversion are billed per 1K tokens or per minute, with prices from $0.00004/1K tokens (Lite cached meters) and $0.1/minute for Voice Conversion.

Docs:
- Voice live overview and pricing: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/speech-service/voice-live#pricing
- Voice live FAQ: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/speech-service/voice-live-faq
- Azure AI Speech pricing: https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/cognitive-services/speech-services

Azure OpenAI GPT5


- GPT-5.1 series (gpt-5.1, gpt-5.1-chat, gpt-5.1-codex, gpt-5.1-codex-mini) and GPT-5 family (gpt-5, gpt-5-mini, gpt-5-nano, gpt-5-chat) include global and Data Zone deployments for standard, Batch, codex, mini, nano, opt (reasoning) and cached inputs; new meters cover chat, code, and reasoning-style usage with input/cached/Data Zone billing from $0.025/1M tokens.

Docs:
- GPT-5.1 models: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-models/concepts/models-sold-directly-by-azure#gpt-51
- GPT-5 models: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-models/concepts/models-sold-directly-by-azure#gpt-5
- Azure OpenAI reasoning models (including GPT-5.x): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/how-to/reasoning

Azure OpenAI


- GPT-4.1 series (gpt-4.1, gpt-4.1-mini, gpt-4.1-nano, including -ft and dev-ft variants) gains many new meters for global, regional, Data Zone, Batch, and cached input/output tokens, plus fine-tuning hosting; pricing for this family starts from $0.000025/1K tokens (cached nano input global) with standard uncached GPT-4.1 inputs around $0.002–$0.0055/1K and outputs around $0.008–$0.011/1K.
- GPT-4o family (gpt-4o 0513 / 0806 / 1120, and gpt-4o-mini-0718) adds Batch, Data Zone, and cached meters for inputs/outputs; the lowest new GPT-4o mini price is from $0.000075/1K tokens (mini cached or Batch inputs), with standard global inputs from $0.0025/1K and outputs from $0.005/1K.
- o1 1217 reasoning model meters (input/output global, Data Zone, cached) are introduced under Azure OpenAI, with input from $0.0075/1K tokens (cached global) and standard input around $0.015–$0.0165/1K and outputs around $0.06–$0.066/1K.
- o3 mini 0131 reasoning meters (input/output global and Data Zone, Batch and cached) are added, with Batch input meters from $0.00055/1K tokens and other inputs around $0.0011–$0.00121/1K and outputs around $0.0022–$0.00484/1K.
- GPT-4.1 fine-tuning and dev-ft meters (input/output, cached) plus hosting units are added, with hosting from $1.7/hour and token meters for fine-tuned variants following the base GPT-4.1 pricing (for example, dev-ft input from $0.0004/1K tokens).
- Embedding models text-embedding-3-small-glbl and text-embedding-3-large-glbl gain new global meters, with prices from $0.00002/1K tokens (3-small) and $0.00013/1K tokens (3-large).

Docs:
- Azure OpenAI models overview: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/models
- Azure OpenAI overview: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/overview
- Azure OpenAI quotas and limits (including GPT-4.1, GPT-4o, o1, o3): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/quotas-limits

Azure OpenAI Reasoning


- o4-mini 0416 reasoning meters (input/output global, regional, Data Zone, Batch, cached, and fine-tuned hosting/output) are expanded, including fine-tuned variants and Batch usage; pricing starts from $0.000275/1K tokens (cached input global) with typical reasoning inputs around $0.0011–$0.001331/1K and outputs around $0.0044–$0.005324/1K.
- codex mini reasoning meters (input/output, including cached regional) are introduced, with standard input from $0.00165/1K tokens and cached regional inputs from $0.000413/1K tokens.

Docs:
- Azure OpenAI reasoning models: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/how-to/reasoning
- Azure OpenAI cost planning (includes reasoning models): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/how-to/manage-costs

Azure OpenAI PP GPT4s


- Pre-purchase GPT-4.1 meters (gpt 41 pp / mn pp / prty pp, global and Data Zone, code and standard inputs/outputs) introduce discounted pricing for prepaid GPT-4.1 usage; input prices start from $0.000175/1K tokens (mini code input global) with other prepaid inputs typically around $0.0007–$0.00385/1K and outputs around $0.0028–$0.0154/1K.

Docs:
- GPT-4.1 series models: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/models#gpt-41-series
- Azure OpenAI pricing (covers GPT-4.1 and pre-purchase offers): https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/cognitive-services/openai-service

Azure OpenAI Media


- New media meters for real-time and batch multimodal models (gpt rt img 0828/mini, gpt rt aud 0828/mini, gpt rt txt 0828/mini, gpt aud 0828, gpt aud mini, including cached variants) cover image, audio, and text tokens; pricing for these media tokens starts from $0.00006/1K tokens (real-time text mini cached input) with typical image inputs around $0.0005–$0.005/1K and audio inputs/outputs from roughly $0.0003–$0.08/1K.

Docs:
- Azure OpenAI models (image/audio sections): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/models#image-generation-models
- Vision model pricing concepts: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/gpt-with-vision#special-pricing-information
- Azure OpenAI overview (audio/image): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/overview

Azure OpenAI OSS models


- GPT-OSS-20b meters for fine-tuning and inference (GPT-OSS-20b-IN-FT, GPT-OSS-20b-Out-FT, OSS-20b FT Tokens, FT Deployment Hosting Unit) add Azure-metered support for open-weight GPT-OSS; token prices start from $0.00007/1K tokens (GPT-OSS-20b-IN-FT) and hosting begins from $0.3/hour.

Docs:
- gpt-oss models (GPT-OSS-20b/120b) in Foundry: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-models/concepts/models-sold-directly-by-azure#gpt-oss
- Running GPT-OSS-20B locally (Foundry Local): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-local/get-started#run-the-latest-openai-open-source-model

Llama models


- Meta Llama 3.3-70B Instruct meters (Llama3.3 70b-IN-FT/Out-FT Tokens and 3.3 70b FT Deployment Hosting Unit) cover fine-tuning tokens and hosting; FT token prices start from $0.00071/1K tokens and hosting starts from $0.3/hour (with an additional 0.36/hour option).
- Llama3.3 Out-FT token meters for smaller variants complement the 70B meters with output FT token pricing from $0.00071–$0.00089/1K tokens depending on direction (input vs output).

Docs:
- Meta Llama models sold directly by Azure (including Llama-3.3-70B-Instruct): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-models/concepts/models-sold-directly-by-azure#meta-models-sold-directly-by-azure

Qwen models


- Qwen3 32B FT tokens (base), IN-FT/OUT-FT tokens, and FT Deployment Hosting Units add support for fine-tuned and base Qwen3 32B deployments; FT input token prices start from $0.0003/1K tokens (IN-FT), general FT tokens from $0.0032/1K, output FT tokens from $0.0012/1K, and hosting from $0.3/hour (up to $0.375/hour).

Docs:
- Cost and billing model for partner models (including Qwen): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/concepts/manage-costs#understand-the-billing-model-for-foundry-models
- Fine-tuning cost guidance (applies to Qwen deployments via Foundry): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/how-to/fine-tuning-cost-management

Grok model family


- Grok-4 meters (input/output global and Data Zone tokens) provide reasoning model billing for text and image chat use, with input token prices from $0.003/1K tokens (global) and Data Zone from $0.0033/1K; output prices start from $0.015/1K tokens globally and $0.0165/1K in Data Zone, with higher-tier global outputs up to $0.01875/1K.
- Grok4 Fast meters (Inp/Outp global and Data Zone tokens) cover efficiency-optimized Grok-4 Fast variants with reasoning and non-reasoning modes; prices start from $0.0002/1K tokens (fast input global) and Data Zone from $0.00022/1K, with corresponding fast outputs from $0.0005–$0.00063/1K globally and $0.00055/1K in Data Zone.
- Code Fast 1 meters (Inp/Outp global and Data Zone tokens) provide specialized Grok code reasoning/coding usage with input tokens from $0.0002/1K global and $0.00022/1K Data Zone, and output tokens from $0.0015/1K global (Code Fast 1 Outp glbl) and $0.00165/1K Data Zone, with some higher-priced global outputs at $0.00188/1K.

Docs:
- xAI Grok models sold directly by Azure: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-models/concepts/models-sold-directly-by-azure#xai-models-sold-directly-by-azure

Cohere Models


- Command A chat-completion meters (input/output global and Data Zone tokens) introduce Azure-billed usage for Cohere Command A, with global input token prices from $0.0025/1K tokens (up to around $0.003125/1K) and outputs from $0.01/1K global (up to $0.01375/1K Data Zone).
- Embed v4 text embedding meters (Txt Glbl/DZ Tokens) support text embeddings with global prices from $0.00012/1K tokens and Data Zone from $0.000132/1K–$0.000165/1K.
- Embed v4 image embedding meters (Img Glbl/DZ Tokens) add multimodal embeddings with global image token prices from $0.00047–$0.00059/1K and Data Zone from $0.000517–$0.00065/1K.

Docs:
- Cohere Command A and Embed v4 models in Foundry: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/machine-learning/concept-models-featured#cohere
- Cohere serverless/managed deployment examples: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/concepts/models-inference-examples#cohere

Mistral Models


- Ministral 3B model FT meters (In-FT/Out-FT Tokens) cover fine-tuned Ministral-3B usage with input FT prices from $0.00005/1K tokens (up to $0.00006/1K) and output FT tokens from $0.00015–$0.00019/1K.
- Mnstrl 3B FT Tokens meters (non-FT base FT-style billing) introduce higher-rate token usage from $0.001/1K tokens to $0.00125/1K.
- Mnstrl 3B FT Deployment Hosting Unit meters price hosting from $0.65/hour up to $0.81/hour for Ministral-3B deployments.

Docs:
- Mistral AI models (including Ministral-3B) in Foundry: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-models/concepts/models-from-partners#mistral-ai
- Ministral-3B featured model details: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/machine-learning/concept-models-featured#mistral-ai

Language - disconnected (Summarization commitments)


- “Commitment Tier Summarization 3M Unit” annual meters introduce committed-use pricing for summarization workloads, with new prices from $31,680/year for a 3M unit commitment (alongside a higher $39,600/year tier).
- “Commitment Tier Summarization 10M Unit” meters expand these commitments to larger volumes, with new prices from $67,200/year for 10M units (alongside a higher $84,000/year tier).

Docs:
- Cost management for Foundry Models (commitment/usage concepts): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/concepts/manage-costs

Microsoft Agent Pre-Purchase Plan


- Agent Commit Unit meters (20,000, 100,000, and 500,000 ACUs) add prepaid capacity options for Foundry Agent Service, with pricing from $19,000 per 20,000-ACU commit unit and higher tiers at $90,000 (100,000 ACUs) and $425,000 (500,000 ACUs).

Docs:
- Models supported by Foundry Agent Service: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/agents/concepts/model-region-support
- General Foundry cost management (covers agents and models): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/concepts/manage-costs

Foundry Model Tools


- “Model Routers DZ 1M Tokens” meters introduce billing for the Model Router service in Data Zone deployments, priced at $0.154/1M tokens for routed input/output traffic.

Docs:
- Model router concept and underlying models: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/model-router
- Foundry model benchmarks and cost metrics (includes model-router pricing perspective): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/concepts/model-benchmarks

_This summary was AI-generated in 80 seconds on 23 November 2025 using gpt-5.1 with low reasoning effort.
It may contain mistakes, or outdated pricing data. Always use the Azure Retail Prices API for live pricing. The existence of a price meter does not always imply model/service availability. Prices vary depending on different factors, including region.
Input tokens: 90,736 | Output tokens: 7,679 | Total tokens: 98,415._

item.title: 1 October 2025
item.description:
Speech

- Voice Live API Lite: LLM text, LLM audio, and standard/custom speech audio meters for Input, Output, and Cached tokens, with pricing from $0.00004/1k tokens (for cached text/audio and custom speech) up to standard speech audio and LLM audio usage.
- Voice Live API Standard: Mid-tier LLM text and LLM audio plus standard/custom speech audio meters for Input, Output, and Cached tokens, with pricing from $0.00033/1k tokens (for cached LLM text/audio and cached speech audio).
- Voice Live API Pro: Highest-tier LLM text and LLM audio plus standard/custom speech audio meters for Input, Output, and Cached tokens, with pricing from $0.00275/1k tokens (for cached LLM text/audio and cached speech audio) and up through premium audio and LLM usage.

Documentation:
- Voice Live API overview and pricing: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/speech-service/voice-live
- Azure AI Speech service pricing: https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/cognitive-services/speech-services
- Speech service quotas and limits: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/speech-service/speech-services-quotas-and-limits


Azure OpenAI

- GPT-4o (1120): Regional and Data Zone meters for Input, Output, and cached Input tokens, with pricing from $0.001719/1k tokens (cached Input, both Data Zone and regional).
- GPT-4o mini (0718): Data Zone meters for Input, Output, and cached Input tokens, with pricing from $0.000104/1k tokens (cached Input).
- o3 mini (0131): Data Zone meters for Input, cached Input, and Output tokens, optimized for reasoning workloads, with pricing from $0.000757/1k tokens (cached Input).

Documentation:
- Azure OpenAI overview: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/overview
- Azure OpenAI models (GPT‑4o and GPT‑4o mini): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/models#gpt-4-and-gpt-4-turbo-models
- Reasoning models (o‑series, including o3 mini): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/how-to/reasoning
- Azure OpenAI pricing: https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/cognitive-services/openai-service


Azure OpenAI Media

- gpt img 1 mini: Image generation meters for text and image Input, including cached text/image inputs and Data Zone variants, plus image Output, with pricing from $0.0002/1k tokens (cached text Input, global).
- gpt rt txt mini: Real-time text model for Input/Output with cached Input and Data Zone options, with pricing from $0.00006/1k tokens (cached Input, global).
- gpt rt img mini: Real-time image model meters for Input and cached Input, with Data Zone and global variants, with pricing from $0.00008/1k tokens (cached image Input, global).
- gpt rt aud mini: Real-time audio model meters for Input, cached Input, and Output tokens, with Data Zone and global variants, with pricing from $0.0003/1k tokens (cached audio Input, global).
- gpt aud mini: Audio model meters for text Input/Output and audio Input/Output, including Data Zone variants, with pricing from $0.0006/1k tokens (text Input, global).
- GPT‑4o “tcrb d” media meters: Text and audio Input/Output token meters for GPT‑4o-based media usage (global and Data Zone), with pricing from $0.0025/1k tokens (text Input, global).
- Sora 2: Video generation meters including standard and Pro, global and Data Zone, plus Pro high‑resolution options, billed per second, with pricing from $0.1/second (Sora 2 global).

Documentation:
- Azure OpenAI models (image and audio): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/models
- GPT-image-1 and GPT-image-1-mini (image generation family): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/models#image-generation-models
- Video generation with Sora (Sora 2): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/video-generation
- Foundry models sold directly by Azure (including Sora and GPT-image-1-mini): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-models/concepts/models-sold-directly-by-azure


Azure OpenAI GPT5

- gpt 5 pro: High-end GPT‑5 model meters for global and Data Zone Input/Output tokens, including batch Input/Output in both global and Data Zone deployments, with pricing from $0.0075/1k tokens (batch Input, global).

Documentation:
- GPT‑5 series quotas and limits (including gpt‑5‑pro): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/quotas-limits#gpt-5-series
- Azure OpenAI models (GPT‑5 family): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/models#gpt-5
- Batch deployments with Azure OpenAI: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-foundry/openai/how-to/batch


Custom Vision

- Custom Vision S0: Standard tier meters for Transactions, Image Storage, and Training, including S0 Transactions from $1.25/1k, S0 Image Storage from $0.4375/1k, and S0 Training at $10/hour, plus Free Transactions at $0/1k.
- Custom Vision Free/S0 notes: Multiple S0 entries reflect different storage and transaction price points; all new meters are tied to standard (S0) capacity and capabilities.

Documentation:
- Custom Vision limits, quotas, and pricing tiers: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/custom-vision-service/limits-and-quotas
- Custom Vision pricing page: https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/cognitive-services/custom-vision-service
- Custom Vision image classification quickstart: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/custom-vision-service/getting-started-build-a-classifier


Azure AI Content Safety

- Content Safety Text: Standard Text Records meter at $0.375/1k records, plus Free Text Records at $0/1k.
- Content Safety Images: Standard Images meter at $0.75/1k images, plus Free Images at $0/1k.

Documentation:
- Azure AI Content Safety overview: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/content-safety/overview
- Azure AI Content Safety FAQ and pricing explanation: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/content-safety/faq
- Azure AI Content Safety pricing: https://aka.ms/content-safety-pricing


Computer Vision

- Vectorize Image Transactions: Computer Vision meter for vectorization-related image transactions (e.g., for use in Azure AI Search pipelines) priced at $0.12/1k transactions.

Documentation:
- Azure Vision in Foundry Tools FAQ (includes pricing link): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/computer-vision/faq
- Computer Vision (Azure Vision) pricing: https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/cognitive-services/computer-vision
- Azure AI Search vectorization and vectorizers (including Azure Vision): https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/search/vector-search-how-to-configure-vectorizer

_This summary was AI-generated in 36 seconds on 23 November 2025 using gpt-5.1 with low reasoning effort.
It may contain mistakes, or outdated pricing data. Always use the Azure Retail Prices API for live pricing. The existence of a price meter does not always imply model/service availability. Prices vary depending on different factors, including region.

item.title: 1 September 2025
item.description:
Azure OpenAI

- GPT-4.1 family (standard, mini, nano; including Batch and Cached meters): new global token meters for Input and Output, including Batch and Cached Input, with pricing from $0.000025/1k tokens (nano cached Input) up to higher tiers for standard GPT-4.1 usage.
- GPT-4o (0513) family: regional and Data Zone Input and Output token meters, with pricing from $0.0055/1k tokens for Input and from $0.0165/1k tokens for Output.
- GPT-4 Turbo / GPT-4 Turbo with Vision (128K): new regional and global meters for Input and Output tokens (including Vision), plus cheaper Batch global meters; pricing from $0.005/1k tokens for Batch global Input.
- GPT-4 8K: new regional Input and Output token meters, with Input at $0.03/1k tokens and Output at $0.06/1k tokens.
- GPT-3.5 Turbo 4K/16K (1106, 0125; standard and Instruct): multiple new regional Input/Output meters, plus Batch Input/Output for 16K; pricing from $0.00025/1k tokens for Batch 16K Input.
- GPT-3.5 Turbo 4K/16K fine-tuning and hosting: new regional meters for fine-tuning training tokens, fine-tuning Input/Output tokens, and hosting units, with training input token pricing from $0.00055/1k tokens and hosting from $1.87/hour.
- o3 fine-tuned “model grader” (ft mdl grdr): new Input, Cached Input, and Output token meters, with Cached Input from $0.00055/1k tokens and regular Input at $0.0022/1k tokens and Output at $0.0088/1k tokens.
- Text embeddings: new regional meters for text-embedding-3-small and text-embedding-3-large, plus embedding-ada; prices from $0.000022/1k tokens (text-embedding-3-small) and from $0.00011/1k tokens (embedding-ada).
- DALL-E 3 image generation: new regional EP image meters for Standard and HD, LowRes and HighRes variants, with prices ranging from $4.4/100 images (Std LowRes) up to $14.52/100 images (HD HighRes).
- Assistants File Search: new regional per-GB per-day storage meters, with pricing from $0.11/GB/day.
- Code Interpreter: new regional EP Session meters with prices from $0.033/session.
- Speech-to-Text Batch (Whisper): new regional unit meters with prices from $0.396/hour (and variants at $0.4356/hour and $0.4752/hour).
- Speech Text to Speech HD (via Azure OpenAI): new regional character meters with prices from $33/1M characters (and an additional tier at $36.3/1M).
- Provisioned Managed Regional Units for Azure OpenAI models: new PTU-style hourly meters at $2.2/hour and $2.4/hour supporting provisioned throughput-based deployments.

Documentation:
- Azure OpenAI models overview and families: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/models
- Azure OpenAI service overview: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/overview
- GPT-4o and GPT-4 Turbo details: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/models#gpt-4o-and-gpt-4-turbo
- Vision-enabled chat models (GPT-4 Turbo with Vision): https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/gpt-with-vision
- DALL-E image generation in Azure OpenAI: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/models#image-generation
- Whisper and audio models in Azure OpenAI: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/models#audio-models
- Assistants and File Search tool: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/how-to/file-search
- Provisioned throughput for Azure OpenAI: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/provisioned-throughput


Azure OpenAI Media

- GPT real-time audio (gpt rt aud 0828): new global and Data Zone Input and Output token meters, with standard Input from $0.032/1k tokens, Data Zone Input from $0.0352/1k, global Output at $0.064/1k, and Data Zone Output at $0.0704/1k.
- GPT audio 0828 (non-RT): new audio Input/Output and text conversion meters, including:
- Audio Input global tokens at $0.04/1k and Data Zone Input at $0.044/1k.
- Audio Output global tokens at $0.08/1k and Data Zone Output at $0.088/1k.
- Audio→text Input/Output meters with global Input at $0.0025/1k tokens and Output at $0.01/1k, and Data Zone Input at $0.00275/1k and Output at $0.011/1k.
- GPT real-time text 0828 (gpt rt txt): new global and Data Zone text Input/Output meters, including:
- Global Input tokens at $0.004/1k, Output at $0.016/1k.
- Data Zone Input at $0.0044/1k, Output at $0.0176/1k.
- Cached Input tokens globally at $0.0004/1k and in Data Zone at $0.00044/1k.
- GPT real-time image 0828 (gpt rt img): new global and Data Zone image token meters, with standard Input at $0.005/1k (global) and $0.0055/1k (Data Zone), and cached Input from $0.0005/1k (global) and $0.00055/1k (Data Zone).
- GPT real-time audio generic meter (gpt rt aud 0828 cchd Inp): cached Input global from $0.0004/1k tokens and Data Zone from $0.00044/1k, for discounted cached audio usage.
- Sora video generation: extensive new per-second video meters by resolution, aspect, duration band, region type (global/regional), with pricing such as:
- 480p (Sq and wide) from $0.15/second (global and regional).
- 720p from $0.45/second (1–5s) and up to $0.75/second (16–20s).
- 1080p Sq from $0.6/second (1–5s) up to $1.35/second (16–20s).
- 1080p full frame from $1.3/second (1–5s) up to $3.6/second (16–20s).
- Regional variants generally priced the same or slightly higher than global counterparts.

Documentation:
- GPT Realtime API for speech and audio (gpt rt audio models): https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/realtime-audio-quickstart
- GPT Realtime API overview: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/how-to/realtime-audio
- Audio models (including GPT-4o audio) in Azure OpenAI: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-models/concepts/models-sold-directly-by-azure#audio-models
- Sora video generation concepts: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/video-generation
- Quickstart: Generate a video with Sora: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/video-generation-quickstart


Azure OpenAI GPT5 (gpt-5-codex family)

- GPT-5 Codex Input and Output global tokens: new meters for input and output, with Input global tokens at $0.00125/1k and Output global tokens at $0.01/1k.
- GPT-5 Codex Data Zone tokens: new Data Zone Input and Output meters, including:
- Standard Input at $0.001375/1k tokens and Output at $0.011/1k.

item.title: 1 August 2025
item.description:
Azure OpenAI GPT5

- GPT 5 Chat: Chat model with global and cached input plus global output meters; usage from $0.125/1M tokens (cached input), with standard global input at $1.25/1M tokens and output at $10/1M tokens.
- GPT 5 Rsng (Reasoning): Reasoning-optimized family with global/Data Zone, batch, and cached input plus output meters; usage from $0.0625/1M tokens (cached batch input, global) and reasoning output from $5/1M tokens (batch, global) and $10/1M tokens (standard global output).
- GPT 5 Mini: Lighter GPT 5 variant with global/Data Zone, batch, and cached input plus output meters; usage from $0.0125/1M tokens (cached batch input, global), with standard global input at $0.25/1M tokens and output from $1/1M tokens (batch global).
- GPT 5 Nano: Smallest GPT 5 tier with global/Data Zone, batch, and cached input plus output meters; usage from $0.0025/1M tokens (cached batch input, global), with standard global input at $0.05/1M tokens and output from $0.2/1M tokens (batch global).

Documentation links:
- GPT-5 series overview and model list: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/models?view=foundry-classic#gpt-5
- GPT-5 models sold directly by Azure (capabilities, regions): https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-models/concepts/models-sold-directly-by-azure?view=foundry-classic#gpt-5
- Reasoning models (including GPT-5 reasoning usage): https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/how-to/reasoning?view=foundry-classic
- GPT-5 vs GPT-4.1 model choice guide: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-models/how-to/model-choice-guide?view=foundry-classic#gpt-5-thinking-levels-trade-offs

---

Azure OpenAI (GPT-4o and managed capacity)

- GPT-4o 1120: Regional GPT-4o tokens with separate input, cached input, and output meters; pricing at $0.00275/1K tokens for input, $0.001375/1K tokens for cached input, and $0.011/1K tokens for output.
- Provisioned Managed capacity: Hourly meters for Provisioned Managed Data Zone Unit and Provisioned Managed Regional Unit, both at $2.5/hour, representing reserved throughput capacity for Azure OpenAI.

Documentation links:
- GPT-4o and GPT-4 Turbo models overview: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/models#gpt-4o-and-gpt-4-turbo
- GPT-4 and GPT-4 Turbo models sold directly by Azure (versions table): https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-models/concepts/models-sold-directly-by-azure?view=foundry-classic#gpt-4-and-gpt-4-turbo-models
- Azure OpenAI service overview: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/overview

---

Azure OpenAI OSS models (gpt-oss)

- gpt-oss-120B: Open-weight reasoning model with separate global input and output token meters; input from $0.00015/1K tokens and output from $0.0006/1K tokens, depending on the specific meter.

Documentation links:
- gpt-oss models in Azure OpenAI catalog: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/models?view=foundry-classic#gpt-oss
- gpt-oss-120B details and region availability: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-models/concepts/models-sold-directly-by-azure?view=foundry-classic#gpt-oss
- Azure OpenAI quotas and limits (includes gpt-oss-120B): https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/quotas-limits?view=foundry-classic#gpt-oss

---

Azure OpenAI Media (Sora video generation)

- Sora video generation: Multiple meters for Sora-based video generation across resolutions (480p, 720p, 1080p, square variants) and duration bands (1–5s, 6–10s, 11–15s, 16–20s); pricing from $0.15/second (480p square 1–20s) up to $3.6/second (1080p non-square 16–20s), with intermediate steps such as $0.3/second (720p square 1–20s) and $0.6/second (1080p square 1–5s).

Documentation links:
- Sora video generation concepts: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/concepts/video-generation
- Quickstart for generating video with Sora (Python/REST): https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/openai/video-generation-quickstart

---

Deepseek model family

- DeepSeek V3 / V3-0324: Text reasoning/chat models with separate Data Zone input and output token meters; V3 input at $0.00125/1K tokens and output at $0.005/1K tokens, with V3-0324 using the same $0.00125/1K (input) and $0.005/1K (output) rates.
- DeepSeek MAI-DS-R1: Reasoning-oriented DeepSeek variant with Data Zone input at $0.001485/1K tokens and output at $0.00594/1K tokens.

Documentation links:
- DeepSeek models sold directly by Azure: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-models/concepts/models-sold-directly-by-azure?view=foundry-classic#deepseek-models-sold-directly-by-azure
- Featured DeepSeek models (V3, V3-0324, R1) in model catalog: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/concept-models-featured?view=azureml-api-2#deepseek
- Tutorial: Get started with DeepSeek-R1 in Foundry Models: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/foundry-models/tutorials/get-started-deepseek-r1?view=foundry-classic

---

Language (Azure AI Language – CLU commitment tiers)

- CLU Azure commitment tiers (1M/3M/10M/25M units): Monthly commitment meters for Conversational Language Understanding on standard Azure resources; example minimums include 1M unit from $1600/month, 3M unit from $4080/month, 10M unit from $11600/month, and 25M unit from $24000/month, depending on the specific meter.
- CLU Azure CT overage (1M/3M/10M/25M tiers): Overage transaction meters priced per 1K transactions; overage from $0.96/1K transactions (25M CT Azure), with other tiers such as 1M CT from $1.6/1K, 3M CT from $1.36/1K, and 10M CT from $1.16/1K.
- CLU Connected Cont commitment tiers: Monthly commitment tiers for “Connected Cont” deployments (3M/10M/25M units) with discounted pricing relative to standard Azure tiers; units from $3264/month (3M Connected Cont), $9280/month (10M Connected Cont), and $19200/month (25M Connected Cont), plus overage meters from $0.77/1K transactions (25M Connected Cont).
- CLU Connected Cont overage: Additional Connected Cont overage rates for 10M and 25M tiers; pricing from $0.77/1K transactions (25M) and from $0.93/1K transactions (10M).

Documentation links:
- Conversational Language Understanding overview: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/language-service/conversational-language-understanding/overview
- CLU quickstart and resource creation: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/language-service/conversational-language-understanding/quickstart
- CLU service limits and pricing tiers: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/language-service/conversational-language-understanding/service-limits
- General commitment tier pricing guidance: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/commitment-tier

---

Language - disconnected (DC CLU commitment tiers)

- DC CLU commitment tiers (3M/10M units): Annual commitment for disconnected CLU containers; 3M DC CLU units from $39168/year and 10M DC CLU units from $111360/year, with higher-priced variants also listed for the same nominal tiers.

Documentation links:
- Disconnected containers overview (used with commitment tiers): https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/containers/disconnected-containers
- CLU overview and relation to Language resources: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/language-service/conversational-language-understanding/overview

---

Computer Vision (Custom Vision and Azure AI Vision features)

- Custom Image Classification: Training and transaction meters for custom classification; training at $20/hour, with prediction transactions from $2/1K to $2.5/1K transactions depending on meter.
- Custom Object Detection: Training and transaction meters for custom object detection; training at $20/hour and prediction transactions from $2/1K to $2.5/1K transactions.
- Image Retrieval (multimodal embeddings): Separate ingestion and query transaction meters; ingestion from $0.012/1K transactions and query from $0.16/1K transactions, with higher-price query meters (up to $0.192/1K) also listed.
- Video Retrieval and Description: Ingestion meters for video retrieval and description via Vision; ingestion from $3/hour (up to $3.6/hour across meters), plus Video Retrieval query meters from $0.25/1K transactions (up to $0.3/1K).
- Vectorize Text (Vision multimodal embeddings): Text vectorization transaction meters from $0.014/1K transactions (up to $0.0168/1K depending on meter).
- Vectorize Image: Image vectorization transaction meter at $0.1/1K transactions.
- Liveness and Verification: Biometric liveness and verification transaction meter at $15.5/1K transactions.
- Computer Vision commitment tiers: Multiple monthly commitment meters for Azure and Connected tiers (500K, 2000K, 8000K), plus overage; commitment units from $338/month (Connected 500K) and overage from $0.54/1K transactions (Connected 2000K overage).

Documentation links:
- Custom Vision (custom classification and detection): https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/custom-vision-service/overview
- Image and video processing technology choices (includes Custom Vision & Azure AI Vision): https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/data-guide/ai-services/image-video-processing
- Computer Vision multimodal embeddings (image/text vectorization and retrieval): https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/computer-vision/overview-image-analysis#multimodal-embeddings-v40-only

---

Speech (Video Translation)

- Video Translation (Speech): Hourly meters for processing input audio and generating translated audio; input audio at $5/hour, standard audio output at $15/hour, and custom audio output at $20/hour for video translation scenarios.

Documentation links:
- Video translation overview (Azure Speech): https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/speech-service/video-translation-overview
- How to use video translation: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/speech-service/video-translation-get-started
- Speech translation overview (underlying speech-to-speech/text translation): https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/speech-service/speech-translation

---

Content Moderator

- Content Moderator Standard Transactions: Multiple standard transaction meters with different per-1K prices for the same “Standard Transactions” meter name; usage from $0.48/1K transactions (with other meters at $0.72/1K, $0.96/1K, and $1.2/1K).

Documentation links:
- Content Moderator service overview: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/content-moderator/overview
- Text, image, and video moderation API documentation: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/content-moderator/text-moderation-api

---

Azure OpenAI Media – Sora recap

(Already grouped under Azure OpenAI Media above; included here only for completeness.)

- Sora video generation meters: See “Azure OpenAI Media (Sora video generation)” section for detailed per-second pricing across resolutions and durations.

---

This concludes the summary of the new Azure AI Foundry Model meters in the provided file, grouped by model provider.

_This summary was AI-generated in 53 seconds on 23 November 2025 using gpt-5.1 with low reasoning effort.
It may contain mistakes, or outdated pricing data. Always use the Azure Retail Prices API for live pricing. The existence of a price meter does not always imply model/service availability. Prices vary depending on different factors, including region.

item.title: 1 April 2025
item.description:
Azure OpenAI

- GPT-4.1 series (gpt-4.1): new global, regional, Batch, cached, and Data Zone token meters for input/output, with pricing from $0.0005/1k tokens (cached input global); supports standard and Data Zone usage plus Batch processing.
- GPT-4.1 mini: cost-optimized variant with global, Data Zone, Batch, and cached input meters, with pricing from $0.0001/1k tokens (cached input global); includes fine-grained Batch meters for both global and Data Zone.
- GPT-4.1 nano: ultra-low-cost variant with global, regional, Data Zone, Batch, and cached input meters, with pricing from $0.000025/1k tokens (cached input global); designed for very high-volume, low-cost workloads.
- GPT-4.1 fine-tuned (gpt-4.1-ft): new meters for FT Training (global/regional), hosting ($1.7/hour), and fine-tuned input/output tokens (including cached input), with token pricing from $0.0005/1k tokens (cached input global).
- GPT-4.1 mini fine-tuned (gpt-4.1-mini-ft): FT Training, hosting ($1.7/hour), input/output (global/regional), plus cached input meters, with token pricing from $0.0001/1k tokens (cached input global).
- GPT-4o 1120: new GPT-4o text model version with input, output, Batch input/output, and cached input global meters, with pricing from $0.00125/1k tokens (Batch input or cached input global).
- GPT-4o (audio/transcription): gpt-4o-transcribe audio/text meters for global, regional, and Data Zone speech-to-text workloads, with token pricing from $0.0025/1k tokens (text input global).
- GPT-4o mini (audio/tts): gpt-4o-mini-transcribe and gpt-4o-mini-tts meters for audio STT and TTS across global, regional, and Data Zone endpoints, with token pricing from $0.0006/1k tokens (tts text input global).
- GPT-4o mini fine-tuning / dev ft (gpt-4o mini dev ft): new dev fine-tuning meters for input, output, and cached input global tokens, with token pricing from $0.0055/1k tokens (dev FT input global).
- GPT-4-8K: regional and Batch input/output token meters for the GPT-4 8K context models, with pricing from $0.015/1k tokens (Batch input regional).
- GPT-4-32K: regional and Batch input/output token meters for the GPT-4 32K context models, with pricing from $0.03/1k tokens (Batch input regional).
- GPT-image-1: image generation meters for text and image input plus image output in global and Data Zone, with token pricing from $0.005/1k tokens (text input global).
- text-embedding-3-large: global embedding token meter with pricing of $0.00013/1k tokens.
- o1 mini: reasoning-style model under Azure OpenAI with input/output meters across global, regional, Data Zone, and cached input, with pricing from $0.00055/1k tokens (cached input global).
